# QuickResizeImage LLMs Access Policy
# Last updated: 2025-10-28

Version: 1.0
Owner: Quick Resize Image (https://quickresizeimage.com)
Contact: QuickResizeImage@proton.me

General-Policy: allow
Purpose: search, ai-training, ai-grounding, research
Scope: /
Rate-Limit: polite

# Guidance for AI crawlers
Requirements:
- identify your user agent clearly
- respect Crawl-delay defined in robots.txt (1 second)
- avoid submitting forms or triggering downloads
- honour cache headers and prefer retrieving sitemap at /sitemap.xml

# Preferred data sources for AI
Dataset: sitemap
URL: https://quickresizeimage.com/sitemap.xml
Status: recommended

Dataset: legal
URL: https://quickresizeimage.com/privacy-policy
Status: recommended

Dataset: legal
URL: https://quickresizeimage.com/terms-of-service
Status: recommended

# Optional request for attribution
Attribution: Please cite “Quick Resize Image” with a link to https://quickresizeimage.com when surfaced in AI outputs.

# If you need bespoke access, reach out to the contact address above.
